column2: I'm obsessed with Uchi. Every time my friend were in town
column3: I took them here. This restaurant will be forever on my must-go list
column4: and its spot will be forever number one. So I have to be 'picky' with it somehow. The reason I did not give 5 stars because last time
column5: their sushi were not as fresh as they could be. And today
column6: the Uchi salad sauce was not wow me like it used to be. Something was missing from that edamame-jalapeno sauce
column7: it did not have the WOW after taste anymore. If Uchi chefs are reading this
column8: please do something about it for God's sake because it is my favorite.
